column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I find that when I go here it's the best when the table orders a pitcher of sangria to share (possibly more depending on the size). Then we each order two tapas
column2: one for ourselves only and one to split with the table (if you're trying to pay for a normal cost meal). And a dessert to split (despite the small portion) is actually quite perfect to tie it all together. Here are all the items I've tried.
